```{r setup}
library(lab4linreg)
```

The lab4linreg package performs linear regression using QR decomposition and has a number of useful functions for accessing and plotting the results.

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.height = 4, fig.width = 6}
linreg_mod <- linreg$new(formula = Petal.Length ~ Species, data=iris)
linreg_mod$plot()
```
